H0.text: What car manufacturing company makes the model Octavia. Skoda

H1.text: What car manufacturing company makes the model Octavia. Volkswagen

H2.text: What car manufacturing company makes the model Octavia. Audi

H3.text: What car manufacturing company makes the model Octavia. AZNP

A4.text: The Škoda Octavia is a small family car (C-segment) produced by the Czech car manufacturer Škoda Auto since the end of 1996.

A5.text: The Octavia is Škoda's most popular model; about 40% of all newly manufactured Škoda cars are Octavias.
